Actors: Le Geng, Xi Qi, Wang Xi, Meihuizi Zeng
Plot: Thirtysomething Chinese-born Lina borrows money to move to Paris to save up money to pursue her entrepreneurial dreams, leaving behind her husband and son in Dong Bei province. But once in ...
